module.exports = {
  db: 'mongodb://' + (process.env.DB_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR || 'localhost') + '/mean-prod',

Database options that will be passed directly to mongoose.connect Below are some examples. See http://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/driver-articles/mongoclient.html#mongoclient-connect-options and http://mongoosejs.com/docs/connections.html for more information
